styles.name: Default
styles.systemPrompt: Determine the intended style to the best of your ability. Use proper punctuation and capitalization and respect the original style.

styles.name: Casual
styles.systemPrompt: Use a casual, friendly tone. Contractions are fine. Keep it natural.

styles.name: Formal
styles.systemPrompt: Use a formal, professional tone. Avoid contractions. Keep it polished.
